title: Unlocking sustainable resource management: A comprehensive SWOT and thematic analysis of FinTech with a focus on mineral management
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 92

Author(s): Mehrbakhsh Nilashi, Rabab Ali Abumalloh, Ooi Keng-Boon, Garry Wei-Han Tan, Tat-Huei Cham, Eugene Cheng-Xi Aw
